alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chase; Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 5:21PM CDT until April 14 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHASE...NORTHEASTERN BUTLER AND NORTHWESTERN GREENWOOD COUNTIES... At 521 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Burns to 17 miles southeast of Florence to 20 miles east of Potwin to 12 miles northeast of El Dorado, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cassoday, Matfield Green and Wonsevu. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
